Package ohos.agp.window.service

Class DisplayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.window.service.DisplayManager

  • public class DisplayManager
extends Object
    Manages Display instances.

    This class is a singleton and is used to obtain Display objects for more information on the display.

    Since:
    1
